string.text:
An Individual strike anywhere match. Useful on it's own but can be annoying if stored individually. It would be better to be kept it dry in a box until it is needed for use. 
 
 

%c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES: 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for: %c[ui_gray_1] starting a fire, lighting a cigarette

A box of strike anywhere matches. Extremely useful for the homeless stalker to keep their matches dry and to prevent matches from littering their backpack. 
 
 

%c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES: 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage container for matches
Added a match to the box
